confirmations.depart: 'Are you sure you want to leave? There are unsaved changes to this page.'

introductions.chemistry: Chemistry helps you to build and manage a tree of pages.
introductions.safe_until_published: Nothing is visible to the public until you publish the page.
introductions.to_begin: To get started, click the link on the left to create a page. It will automatically become your home page, but you can move everything around later.
introductions.template_explanation: When you create a new page, Chemistry will ask you to choose a template. The template is really just a readymade stack of page sections and the default set will give you some good starting points, but you can also start by reviewing and adding

notes.image_weighting: Click on a sector to pin that part of the image in view, so for example if you click the bottom-left square then the top right part of the image will be lost when it is cropped.
notes.external_url: Please give full web address including http:// or https:// prefix
notes.term_search_hint: Type in a search term to see suggestions. Press enter to create a new tag.
notes.video_providers: Videos can be embedded automatically from youtube, vimeo and most other providers. Just paste a URL or youtube ID here.

pages.config_description: Please be careful when changing template or parent page
pages.new_description: Please choose a template and parent page.
pages.new_home_description: Please choose a title and template for your first page

image.caption: Optional image caption
image.file: Click or drop image file here

standard.primary: The text of the main page block. While editing you can also add headings, lists, inline images, video, quotes and marginal annotations. Click the plus button on an empty line to see all the options.

home.title: Click or tap to put your welcome message here
home.secondary: Click or tap to add optional extra messages and links here. Press return for a new column.

illuminated.primary: The standfirst usually gives an introduction or summary of around 30-50 words.
illuminated.secondary: Optional page notes or picture caption.
illuminated.title: Optional page title

standfirst.primary: The standfirst usually gives an introduction or summary of around 30-50 words.

statement.title: Click or tap to put a big loud message in here
statement.secondary: Click or tap to add optional extra messages and links here. Press return for a new column.

video.caption: Optional video caption
video.file: Click or drop video file here

waiters.image_import: Please wait: fetching and processing remote image.
waiters.video_import: Please wait: fetching and preparing video embed.
